tips.text: Anda aur dahi ki jo pairing hai, wo protein + gut dono repair karti hai.
Workout ke baad 30 minute ka window hai - us waqt protein zaroor lo.
Raat ka khana 2 ghante pehle finish karo. Digestion aur sleep dono better hongi.
Progressive overload ka matlab ye hai - har hafte thoda sa weight ya reps badhao.
Sabr aur consistency hi asli game changer hai. Rome ek din mein nahi bana.
Paani kam peene se metabolism slow ho jata hai. Din mein 8-10 glass zaroor piyo.
Compound exercises jaise squats aur deadlifts se zyada muscles ek saath kaam karti hain.
Sleep kam hogi to gains kam honge. 7-8 ghante ki neend zarroori hai.

weeklyMessages.message: Tu mehnat kar. Taqdeer ka rona chhod. Allah se umeed rakh aur body banane mein consistency dikhao.
weeklyMessages.author: Moeed Mirza

weeklyMessages.message: Har rep Allah ke naam pe karo. Jab intention sahi hogi, to results bhi blessed honge.
weeklyMessages.author: Moeed Mirza

weeklyMessages.message: Nafs ko control karna gym se mushkil hai. Lekin dono mein mehnat lagi hai bhai.
weeklyMessages.author: Moeed Mirza

weeklyMessages.message: Budget tight hai to creativity badhao. Daal-chawal mein bhi protein aur energy mil sakti hai.
weeklyMessages.author: Moeed Mirza
